title: Megan Barton Hanson and Chelcee Grimes 'were texting the same woman'
text:
The girls were involved in a bit of a love triangle (Picture: Getty; Teddy Edwardes/Twitter)

Megan Barton Hanson and her ex-girlfriend Chelcee Grimes were allegedly messaging the same woman before they split up.

The couple dated for six weeks before they parted ways earlier this month – with Megan, 25, throwing some shade at her ex by sharing an Instagram story reading: ‘Relationships are supposed to make you feel good.’

And it turns out a sort-of love triangle could have been the reason for their break-up.

It has been claimed that both Megan and singer Chelcee were both sliding into the DMs of club night founder Teddy Edwardes.

Awkward.

Megan and Chelcee dated for six weeks (Picture: Getty)

On 15 October, Teddy – who previously dated X Factor star Lucy Spraggan and appeared on First Dates – tweeted: ‘I’ve got a girl and her girlfriend in my DM’s but neither of them know the other is doing it.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘When do I break the news or do I carry on and mind my business?’

And a source has claimed that not only were Megan and Chelcee the girlfriends in question, but that they were rumbled because Megan’s other recent ex Demi Sims was also messaging Teddy.

Again, awkward.

The source told the Mail Online: ‘Megan and Chelcee were just as bad as each other. They were both sending messages to Teddy without the other one knowing.

‘Demi was also thrown into the mix. She was sending texts to Teddy as well.’

They claimed that after seeing Teddy’s tweet about the love triangle, Towie star Demi sent the tweet to Megan to ‘stir the pot’.

Megan and Chelcee, 27, soon split after ‘huge rows’.

Demi Sims was also texting Teddy (Picture: BACKGRID)

Teddy, 29 – who founded the nightclub for queer women LICK – alluded to the drama as she tweeted: ‘How have I been single 5 minutes and already become centre stage of every lesbian drama? Just let me lesbian in peace for gods sake.’

And after one person tweeted: ‘TeddyEdwardes and @ChelceeGrimes both single now they would be major #couplegoals’, Teddy wrote: ‘She #wishes.’

Love Island star Megan left the 2018 series in a relationship with Wes Nelson, but they split up after six months together in January.

Since then, the reality star briefly found love with Demi, 23, on Celebs Go Dating – but recently claimed there was nothing sexual about their romance.

Speaking to Fabulous, Megan said: ‘It even got to a point where I was doubting myself, like “do I like women?” We would just kiss, I couldn’t do anything more.

‘I felt I liked her more as a friend. I’d be laying in bed with her and all we could do was kiss.

‘We couldn’t get past that point and I was doubting if I’m actually gay. It’s not right. She’s a lovely girl but we didn’t have that spark.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted Megan and Chelcee’s reps for comment.
